title: EP 115: The Mac Minister Interview
itunes:title: EP 115: The Mac Minister Interview
description:
Mac Minister was profiled on an episode of America's Most Wanted, allegedly responsible for the murder of Anthony "Fat-Tone" Watkins in Las Vegas, Nevada, in retaliation for the murder of Bay Area hip-hop icon Mac Dre.

We had the opportunity to converse with Mac Minister from the belly of the beast. We spoke on the holes in his case, how he feels certain people abandoned him after his sentence and why his spirit is as strong as ever, and the very strong possibility of him coming home.

Mac also goes into great detail about his upcoming book “Nicademus The Crime Boss Of The Jungle Hood”, which is available on his Instagram page @themacminister


Views and opinions expressed by this episodes guest do not necessarily reflect the views of The Gangster Chronicles Podcast, Black Effect or iHeart

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
